hero.title: Positano to Naples – Directions by Ferry
hero.description: Clear steps to walk from Hostel Brikette to Positano’s port, purchase ferry tickets, and continue to Naples, including seasonal notes and arrival guidance for Napoli Centrale.
hero.tip: If ferries are cancelled due to weather, switch to a bus/train itinerary in the <GuideLink>How to Get Here overview</GuideLink>.

journeyOverview.title: Journey overview
paragraphs: Ferries between Positano and Naples run most often from spring to early autumn and may be cancelled in rough seas. Travel time is typically around 70–90 minutes depending on operator and vessel.

walkToPort.title: Walk to Positano’s port
steps: Exit the hostel via the main door.
Go down the stairs to the road, turn left, and walk just over 100 m (≈330 ft).
At the first junction (point 1), turn right by the Tabacchi (first building on the right).
Continue downhill; at the first switchback (point 2), leave the road and take the stairs straight ahead.
At the bottom of the stairs, reach the road (point 3); cross and continue straight onto the next stairs.
When those stairs end at the road, cross over, turn left briefly, then take the stairs at point 4.
At the bottom, turn right to reach point 5, then continue under the archway on the right.
The port (Spiaggia Grande pier) sits about 50 m (≈160 ft) ahead on the right-hand side of the beach.

tickets.title: Buy tickets and board
steps: At the port each ferry operator has its own booth.
The sign beside the booth shows the next departure for that operator.
Buy tickets directly from the operator; arrive 20–30 minutes early to exchange vouchers and queue.
After purchasing, walk to the end of the pier and wait for boarding to begin.

arrival.title: On arrival in Naples
paragraphs: Disembark at the port area and continue to your onward transport. For Napoli Centrale (Piazza Garibaldi), the tram is typically the simplest option from the port area.
Suggested route: <TramLink>Take the tram between the port and Napoli Centrale</TramLink>.
For luggage-friendly walking in Positano on your return, see: <LuggageGuideLink>Ferry dock → Hostel Brikette, with luggage</LuggageGuideLink>.
